title: Twinkle Heart: Gingakei made Todokanai
synopsis: Love, Heaven's greatest treasure went missing and to get it back, the Great God decides to send his two daughters Lemon and Cherry, as well as their governess Berry to find it. However, their search doesn't go so well, mainly because they decide they like it at planet Earth and prefer to work in a hamburger shop (Sic!).
staff: [['Terada, Kenji', ['Script']], ['Watanabe, Hiroya', ['Theme Song Arrangement']], ['Kise, Kazuchika', ['Key Animation']], ['Okuda, Seiji', ['Chief Animation Director', ' Original Creator']]]
